name: Bloodlust | Early Beta v0.0.1
description:
Soldier!

You need to save Humanity from the hordes of Zombies!  Take whatever equipment we have, a Rocket Launcher, Machine Gun, and Pistol!

The game is still in development! So expect some features to be bugged!

  • Bug Fixes
  • Shop
  • Wave System

And More Ideas to come!
